title: Ranked Decay warning
body:
Didn't get to screenshot, but it says I have 9 days to play until i reach ranked decay. I just played 17 hours ago... Is this intended?
Thanks

replies.body: Your Ranked Solo looks solid, but not Ranked Flex.  You haven't played in that queue in a bit, so you'll want to asap!
thank you, wish it was more clear. i appreciate the response
